ygData.subject: Re: Playstation
ygData.msgSnippet: ... zones? ... you re ... do with ... of Guides ... for that ... On my server there aren t many GM events.  Word spreads pretty fast when there is one.  I was
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "erik" <naslund@a...> wrote:
> > From: <Kuervodr@n...>
> >
> >
>
> >> "When is the last time you been to a GM event, or have seen a
> >> majot development to the story with new zones or changes in
zones?"
> >
> > Hmm, I've been to a gm event within the last few weeks and my RL
> girlfriend
> > has been on 2 within the last month or month and a half. Perhaps
you're
> just
> > missing them?
>
> Not to mention that the number of "GM" events really has nothing to
do with
> the number of GMs available, but everything to do with the number
of Guides
> on a particular server and their workload (and their creativity,
for that
> matter).

On my server there aren't many GM events. Word spreads pretty fast
when there is one. I was in Qeynos Hill during two of the undead
Invasions there and had a good time. I have also been through
several Halloween events, though I always seem to arrive late!

And you are right about Guides. I saw 4 of them and a GM just prior
to the trial in Qeynos. Yeah, missed that one too! :(

Tuldayen Grimblade
36th Season Ranger of Tunare
Terris-Thule
